item.title: WIRED Roundup: ChatGPT Goes Full Demon Mode
item.description: On today’s episode of Uncanny Valley, our senior business editor joins us to talk Meta, brain aging, and ChatGPT’s recent dark turn.

item.description: This ultra-powerful AI is ultra-expensive.

item.title: Inside Jeffrey Epstein’s Forgotten AI Summit
item.description: Long before ChatGPT, a group of AI luminaries gathered on an island to discuss the future of artificial intelligence. Their funder ultimately cast a shadow on all who attended.

item.title: Confessions of a Recovering AI Porn Addict
item.description: A “gooner” tells WIRED he became hooked on the cartoonish nature of AI porn. Several addictions experts say the genre could pose a problem for people prone to compulsive sexual behavior.

item.title: Confessions of a Recovering AI Porn Addict
item.description: A “gooner” tells WIRED he became hooked on the cartoonish nature of AI porn. Several addictions experts say the genre could pose a problem for people prone to compulsive sexual behavior.

item.title: YouTube’s selfie collection, AI age checks are concerning, privacy experts say
item.description: Any YouTuber wrongly labeled a teen must provide an ID, credit card, or selfie.

item.title: The Real Demon Inside ChatGPT
item.description: AI chatbots strip language of its historical and cultural context. Sometimes what looks like a satanic bloodletting ritual may actually be lifted from Warhammer 40,000.
